description.ko: 단일 광선이 PRISM-2의 렌즈를 통해 다채로운 스펙트럼으로 변화하는 과정을 보여주는 광학 물리학의 시각적 탐구입니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of optical physics, showcasing the transformation of singular light into a diverse spectrum through the lens of PRISM-2.

prompt: Cinematic macro shot of a triangular glass prism engraved with 'PRISM-2', a sharp beam of white light entering and dispersing into a brilliant, wide rainbow spectrum, hyper-realistic refraction, intricate caustics on a dark surface, bokeh background, 8k resolution, optical physics aesthetic.
